item.title: Resume
item.description:
Experience Link to heading

Principal Applications Engineer | Oracle Jan 2021 - Present Link to heading

I started with Oracle B2C Agent Browser UI and later moved to Fusion, where I worked on Service Center and UEF. I gained experience in various Oracle technologies such as OCI, ADF, Visual Builder, and ORDS. These days, I am focusing on AI.

Principal Engineer | CDAC Nov 2008 - Jan 2021 Link to heading

I worked at CDAC for over 12 years, starting as an Engineer and growing into the role of Principal Engineer. My experience spanned diverse projects across IoT, web platforms, data visualization, and dashboards for government and institutional clients. Early on, I contributed to hardware and embedded systems like smart plugs, respiratory monitoring systems, and lighting solutions. Later, I focused on full-stack web development, building regulatory platforms, portals for law enforcement, anomaly detection systems for national exams, and COVID-19 dashboards using technologies like React, Vue, Angular, Express, and MEAN stack.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Duplicate Extractor Link to heading

When syncing with Apple Photos, duplicate photos are often created, and multiple folders and files may get duplicated during export. This tool automatically identifies and removes duplicate files from the selected source folder. Regardless of the file name or location, if the content is identical, the duplicate files are moved to the specified target folder for easy management.
